tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: General Dental Care,Crown And Bridge Work,
review:
I am living in Singapore and took appointment to get the treatment done within available limited time. Dr. Nikita and Dr. Isha were very friendly and solved my front tooth crown damage and gum swelling issue. They were very professional and explained me in detail about the procedures. 

Also Dr. Nikita used to follow up even after treatment which really great.

I am very surprised and happy to experience the type of professional & friendly medical service which very very rare in the industry. 

Overall I am very happy and look forward to get my other tooth treatments done during my next visit to India.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Dental Examinations,
review: Dr Nikita was very practical and methodical with her approach. She ensured that the procedures were very painless and took extra effort to ensure all precautions are taken to ensure no future recurrence of the issue. Goes the extra mile for ensuring patient care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Nikita is a hard working professional and even though it was bit late knowing that I was in pain immediately started rc treatment and medication- she is very patient and ensures that there is follow up done - she also explains the details and I had a green experience with her- highly recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently visited Dr. Nikita Singh at Apollo Hospital due to excruciating tooth pain. My experience with Dr. Singh was exceptional. She quickly identified the issue and provided only the necessary treatment, avoiding unnecessary procedures that could have increased costs without benefiting my condition.

Prior to visiting Dr. Singh, I had consulted another dentist closer to my home. They recommended several fancy and irrelevant procedures, clearly aiming to exploit the situation for financial gain. In stark contrast, Dr. Singh and the Apollo team demonstrated genuine care for their patients. The problem was explained clearly, and the proposed treatment plan was both necessary and budget-friendly.

Dr. Singh's approach to complex issues is also commendable. She explains everything in a manner that comforts the patient( unlike the intimidating manner of Dr. House from the TV show! ) She takes her time to ensure the patient is comfortable, even if it requires multiple sittings.

Additionally, the appointment reminders were very helpful. I received reminders a day prior and on the day of the appointment, which greatly helped me stay organized.

Overall, my root canal treatment was a wonderful and smooth experience. I highly recommend Dr. Nikita Singh for her professionalism, patient-centric approach, and transparent treatment plans.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I've had multiple procedures done by Dr. Nikita Singh, and each experience has been exceptional. She quickly identifies the problem and provides only the necessary treatment, avoiding unnecessary procedures. Dr. Singh genuinely cares about her patients' well-being. She explains everything clearly and ensures comfort throughout the treatment, even if it takes multiple visits. My root canals were smooth and stress-free. I highly recommend Dr. Nikita Singh for her professionalism and patient-centric approach.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Good clinic. In Whitefield for all dental procedures.
Would recommend this clinic.
Reminders were sent before appointment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently visited Dr. Nikita Singh at apollo dental, whitefield main road, for tooth scaling and filling, and I couldn't be happier with the results! She performed the procedures with such precision and care that the entire experience was virtually painless. Not only that, but she took the time to thoroughly explain the condition of my teeth, ensuring I understood every aspect of the treatment. The expertise and professionalism displayed by Dr. Nikita and her team made my visit truly exceptional. I highly recommend her to anyone seeking top-notch dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Teeth cleaning & polishing,Dental Cavity Filling,Zirconia Crowns,
review:
I recently had a wonderful experience at Apollo Dental Clinic! From the warm welcome at reception to the skilled hands of the dentist, every step was exceptional. The teeth cleaning and polishing left my teeth feeling incredibly clean and refreshed, while the cavity removal was done with precision and care.

The crown fitment, although done by another specialist doctor, was seamlessly integrated into my overall treatment plan. The dentist coordinated the process flawlessly, ensuring continuity of care and a smooth transition between procedures. The end result is a beautifully fitted crown that blends seamlessly with my natural teeth, thanks to the expertise of both the dentist and the specialist doctor.

I highly recommend Dr. Nikita Singh for their professionalism, expertise, and comprehensive approach to dental care. Their dedication to patient satisfaction is evident in every aspect of their practice, from the quality of their services to the personalized attention they provide. I'm grateful for the exceptional care I received and look forward to returning for future dental needs!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I recently visited Apollo Dental for a root canal treatment and bridge replacement, and I had the pleasure of being looked after by Dr. Nikita Singh. I would like to share my review based on my experience with her. 

First and foremost, I visited Apollo Dental due to a tooth pain, and Dr. Nikita provided me with a thorough diagnosis. She confirmed that the pain was indeed caused by an infection, which put my mind at ease, knowing the cause of my discomfort.

One of my biggest concerns was preserving the tooth since it had already undergone a root canal treatment. Dr. Nikita went above and beyond to address this concern. She took the extra step of calling in the regional head of Apollo Dental to assist in cutting my crown, as there were complications surrounding it. This level of attention and dedication to preserving my tooth was truly commendable.

Throughout the entire course of the root canal treatment, Dr. Nikita took the time to explain the process to me and what I could expect during each appointment. Her clear explanations helped me understand the treatment better and alleviated any anxieties I had.

Dr. Nikita's patience with my anxieties was exceptional. She provided me with full support and reassurance throughout the entire course of the treatment. Her compassionate approach made me feel comfortable and confident in her care.

Another aspect that impressed me was Dr. Nikita's punctuality. She was always on time for our appointments and even provided upfront notice if there was a slight delay, which I greatly appreciated. Her professionalism and respect for my time did not go unnoticed.

The entire treatment process took about a month, and I appreciated that Dr. Nikita did not rush things. She wanted to ensure that the infection was settled properly before completing the treatment. This level of diligence and attention to detail demonstrated her commitment to providing the best possible care.

Overall, I am extremely satisfied with the treatment I received from Dr. Nikita Singh at Apollo Dental. Her expertise, dedication, and patient-centered approach were exemplary. I would highly recommend her to anyone seeking dental treatment, and I am confident that she would provide the same exceptional care to my friends and family.
reply_text: Thank you so much Kuldeep for taking out time and putting such a detailed feedback. I am so glad that we managed to finish your case with a healing exactly what I was expecting. Also, it was a great pleasure to have such a cooperative patient like you. Take care. 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Its a very nice experience with Dr.Nikita Singh, she is very friendly and explains the process of treatment very clearly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: I  first time came to Southern India from Australia. Initially, I met Dr.  Nikita Singh, who examined my teeth. She found not only crowned fixing, behind that my previous route canal fillings were done from different places and also inaccurate. Due to that, just fixing a crown will not help in the long run.  As a well-trained, experienced doctor M/S Nikita Singh extended her valuable time and examined the entire area of the mouth.  She organises a consultation with Dr.  Shahbaz and, as per the directions of Dr. Shahbaz she attends to my tooth. They re-routed one of the teeth and fixed the proper bridge also.  Dr. Nikita , Dr. Shahbaz and the team are THE BEST services I ever received.  To continue to check up next trip from Australia, I am coming to Whitefield, India. I am so lucky to get the services from a great professional setup. It is my privilege to me the opportunity to express my feedback about your services.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,GIC Tooth Fillings,
review:
I had this toothache issue for quite sometime.  I visited  Apollo Dental  Care hospital Whitefield. This hospital I usually visit for my dental problems. 
I was treated by Dr Nikita and I was very much impressed  by her quite friendly behavior for comforting me since I was in pain. Also she treated so nicely that I did not feel if anything is being done to my teeth.  Since the tooth required Root Canal treatment I had three siting with Dr Nikita and I was very satisfied with her treatment.
Overall I can say that Dr Nikita is a real expert in her domain and an excellent doctor. I will definitely refer her to all my contacts whoever has any dental problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I wanted to express my deepest gratitude for the exceptional care and expertise to Dr. Nikita. Your commitment to ensuring my comfort and well-being throughout the process was truly commendable.

Dr. Nikita, as the root canal surgeon, your assistance in assessing my condition and explaining the intricacies of the root canal process was invaluable. Your comprehensive explanations helped alleviate my concerns and enabled me to make informed decisions about my treatment. The procedure itself was seamless, and I appreciate the follow-up care you provided afterward.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had an incredible experience at Apollo Dental Whitefield. From the moment I walked in, the staff was warm and welcoming, making me feel at ease right away. Dr. Nikita Singh and the entire team are true professionals who go above and beyond to ensure their patients receive top-notch care.

Due to my previous dental procedure I couldn't be happier with the results. Dr. Nikita Singh was skilled, knowledgeable, and compassionate throughout the entire procedure. They patiently answered all my questions and addressed any concerns I had, which helped ease my anxiety.

I highly recommend Apollo Dental Whitefield to anyone in need of dental care. Whether it's a routine check-up or a more complex procedure, you can trust them to provide exceptional service. I'm so grateful to have found such a fantastic dental practice!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
context: Acrylic Partial Denture,Dental Fillings,Dental X-Ray,Dental Crowns,
review: My visit from start to finish has been exemplary. First class service. My needs were put first .. Dr. Nitika is so kind. Stopping and checking I am ok ...Putting my favourite music on  and lovely cup of tea / coffee whatever you would like . I am in holiday here, so Dr. Nakita has adjusted her schedule to accommodate me.. I cannot recommend her and her team enough ...You will be surprised to know there are no injections ..Pain relief was applied with a numbing gel and spray wonderful.. All my dental work has been quick and at a very good  price...You can go and feel rest assured you will experience dental health care in a warm kind and caring environment..Putting you first because Dr. Nakita cares about all her patients ..
reply_text: Thank you so much for the kind words Michelle. It was a pleasure treating you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I'm delighted to share my positive experience with Ms. Nikita Singh.Her professionalism and expertise created a comfortable environment during my visits. The staff was friendly, and the doctor took the time to address my concerns, making me feel confident in their care. I appreciate the emphasis on patient education, as it helped me understand and maintain my oral health. Overall, I highly recommend this dental practice for their exceptional service.

She’s a fantastic Dr. Quite caring for her patient. Want to have the update on patient 24 hours basis. My wife; who has high sugar, had an injury to her main biting tooth and had severe infection. Being high sugar patient, the wound wasn’t recovering and consequently suffered nagging pain. But, Dr Nikita handled the whole thing quite patiently and did disinfection thrice before fixing the routes. She was against high dose of antibiotics as well as pain killers; which helped my wife to avoid constipation. Finally; RTC was done in 4th sitting. Btw, two sittings of disinfection were free. She’s an excellent young Dr. The best part is the concern and care she showed in the entire procedure!
reply_text: Thank you so many for all the good words. 🙏🏻

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited Apollo Dental, Whitefield for Root canal Treatment.  I am very much happy and satisfied with the treatment received by Dr. Nikitha Singh.
Doctor is very  professional, patient and friendly.  I was at ease right from my first appointment. I would like to recommend Dr. Nikitha Singh to everyone.
I am very grateful to Doctor.

I went to Dr. Nikita when I had persistent pain on both sides of my mouth whenever having hard food. She examined my case carefully and patiently understood the entire history. I got a filling done on one side and it was a very smooth procedure. I didn't even realise and the procedure was over in no time. The thing I appreciated most about her was her empathy with the patient. She kept checking with me whether I felt any discomfort during the procedure and she would calibrate her response accordingly. She showed me images of my teeth before and after the process with complete transparency. She also explained what to be expect for a couple of days and the do's and donts' that I needed to follow. She is also very approachable after the consultation and responded quickly over whatsapp when I had a couple of questions.

I had a very comfortable experience consulting her as this is the level of clarity, transparency, information and empathy that I expect but generally don't see in many doctors. I would highly recommend her for any dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Apollo Dental Whitefield branch for Re treatment of Bridge and Root canal . 
 I personally want to thank Dr Nikita Singh and Dr Shahbaz :
 Thank you so much  for the time you took to give me the best treatment ever . The medications and guidance given are valuable and pain and sensitivity in the teeth is a thing of the past . I am grateful for the top notch care provided by Apollo .

The secret of awesome recovery are doctors who are extraordinary.

tags: Value for money,
review: I visited Appollo dental clinic in Whitefield for scaling and root canal. I am very satisfied with the service I received. They are very flexible and accomodating with timings. Dr Tejaswi did a great job scaling . Dr Nikitha did an excellent job with my root canal and Dr Shahbaz finished it very neatly with installing the crown. I would definitely recommend this place for all your dental needs.

The Dental clinic is well equipped with all the facilities. Thanks to Dr Nikitha for her taking out of my pain permanently. Thanks to all the staff as well.
